name: Jason Dunbar
text: Simple review this time. Food is lower quality and it's not in it's hayday anymore. Feels similar to being at Golden corral.

name: Jacklyn Harknett
text: My experience today started off a little rocky. I ordered food online and it charged my card but they never got my order. So I was able to talk with a manager named Jarvis and he took very good care of me. As long as this place keeps people like him I will always be coming back. THANK YOU JARVIS for everything you did for me today!

name: Dee Biznatch
text: Great service and perfect pizza.

name: Lisa Asbury
text: Salad bar fresh and tasty. Pan pizza very good. Courteous, efficient staff. Cleanliness, such as top of lights and deep cleaning needs done in the store.

name: Edgar Friendly
text: Got there as the lunch buffet was ending, but they put out a fresh pizza for me anyway. Was really good, and the place was not crowded. Waitress was great.

name: Kyle Ekola
text: Called to ask for delivery out to Dayton she said no and hung up before I could even say ok we’ll just pick it up. New Pizza Hut is off to a great start with customer service

name: Mary Edwards
text: Pizza was greasy.  We ordered a hand tossed but the crust was very thin,  almost like the thin and crispy. The store was very small reminds me of the size that AJ's (burger place) is.

name: Kyrianna Morgan
text: This entire store smells of cat urine and the service leaves alot to be desired.

name: Desi Lane
text: Fast delivery & good food, but we received wrong items. We ordered online, but their receipt was different from our online receipt/order. The employee kept putting me on hold to go speak with his manager... At one point, I could hear the …More

name: Derek Troyer
text: Good food with good service

name: Bren Walker
text:
Great place! This so far has the BEST pizza in town. Love this Pizza Hut! :)
The servers are nice and very clean area.

name: GetFitWithFaith
text: I've always ordered here and it's always has been amazing. I called and talked to Savannah and she was so nice and answered all my questions and everything. Wonderful place!

name: Tammy Payne
text: It really depends on which one you go to. I like the one on Teal Rd. The best. The One on Farrabee is too greasy.

name: Russell @ Jaci Myers
text: Gave our order with our cookie. Waited 20 minutes for part of our order. Still waited another 15 minutes for our other pizza. Our cookie still was not done. Went to pay our bill with the cookie on it. They said it was an add on. I told them that we place it the same time as our order. I'm done with Pizza Hut for good.

name: Ben Anderson
text: Salad bar needed attention. Only basic pizzas available. No speciality pizzas at bar.

name: Anthony Currence
text: Good food, verry friendly people hard to find. Actually delivers to my semi truck. All round nice people

name: Mia Chuwku
text: We ordered pasta and all the meatballs were frozen in center on both mine and my partners.  The personal pan pizza my nephew ordered one out to us fine.

name: Jacob Meyer
text: Good quality in a small amount of time

name: KING L.A.
text: I'm really glad Pizza hut came to my area. Fast delivery and always good.

name: Tina L. Staley
text: Awesome pizza, excellent service

name: Charlene Sherry
text: Pizza was cooked perfectly. We could have used a little more cheese on the pepperoni pizza, but it was delicious.

name: Clarinda C
text: It's Pizza Hut!!! Next to Giordano's, PH pan pizza is my favorite. Buffet on Fridays for lunch is reasonable and great convenience! Friendly wait staff and very prompt!

name: Teresa Wilson
text: It's not that the food is bad it's just that they need more servers taking care of the bar during the lunch time

name: Adam Elliott
text: The supreme pizza with stuffed crust is awesome!

name: Kimberly Maxwell
text: Decent variety on the lunch buffet if you have time to wait.

name: Christy Hodgen
text: Everything was good except for breadsticks. Very hard and ended up throwing then away.

name: David Hatten
text: A smaller location, they have a Pizza Buffet on the weekends, and a salad bar all the time.  Typically very empty and quiet, good for a small get together with friends/family.

name: Ron Niccum, Sr.
text: The Pizza Hut on teal rd. has the best, most friendly, and most helpful employees from the person who answers the phone, to the delivery people, to the managers they make you feel like you are important to them and are part of their family!! The pizza and wings are good too!!!

name: Micah Mcqueen
text: The food is good.  Sometimes slow.  Staff is usually friendly.

name: Michael Santos
text: manager on staff extremely rude to me on the phone. i called in and they started talking about someone elses order, when i finally got them to understand that wasnt me and i was calling for a different reason. they told me the card was …More

name: tony randall
text: Some like this pizza but dominos is the best .. Fresh dough made every day

name: Richard Nead
text: Stopped in for the buffet every thing was fresh & hot, the salad bar was well stocked, the restaurant was very clean & the waitress was on top of things. I will be back

name: Richard Stair
text: Decent pizza, but nothing special.  Kids love it.

name: Rob Beck
text: Good pizza buffet.  The service was good.

name: Jon Reynolds
text: Excellent for a Sunday brunch at the buffet service was great

name: Thomas Martin
text: Got good food good people just haven't been there a lot to read it really good

name: Bob Richards
text: An older location, but friendly staff and good pizza/salad buffet at lunch. Mondays are double punch lunch card days for the buffet.

name: kevin zarco
text: I always love to have wings with my pizza, and this place is the only Pizza Hut I've gone to that has good wings.

name: Rita Hernandez
text: I found a long hair on one of the slices of pizza that we carry out,  I'm very disappointed about it!

name: Gloria East
text: Never had any problem at this Pizza Hut. They have great pizza also!

name: Brian Romesburg
text: Not the best Pizza Hut or even the best pizza around, but we all have our favorite places. If I were to go to Pizza Hut, I'd probably select another location.

name: Ann Miller
text: Ordered 2 pizzas, salad and breadsticks at 6:30pm. Delivery driver stated she grabbed the wrong pizza and that a man would be bringing a replacement shortly and credit us 2 pizzas. 1 hour went by and we called just to be told it would be …More

name: Jordan Miller
text: It's a nice new Pizza hut!

name: Royal Frostie
text: Semi good staff. Fast enough.

name: ma ma
text: Location is not even a mile from my home but my car is down. Ordered at 6:38pm, just got my pizza at 8:03pm. Food is luke warm at best. Smallest tip I've ever given.

name: Kylie cheyenne Trail
text: I love how easy and maintainable ordering online is

name: SASHA PitBull2016
text: Awesome pizza, great pastas, and friendly staff.

name: Aaron Newman
text: They always get my online order right! But for some reason, the thiner pizzas always seem more burnt.

name: Kyle Kelley
text: Good pizza, good prices.

name: Robert Richardson
text: Sometimes the dough in the pan pizza is undercooked, but besides that I've never had a problem. Pizza is what you'd expect from Pizza Hut and the customer service is fine.

name: Rob Blue
text: Been going here for years. Never a let down, never crappy.

name: Lord Aku
text: First two pizzas were so good, we went back and ordered two more

name: Tots G
text: Very poor management!!! Have gotten my order screwed up more than 3 times will never order from this Pizza Hut again.

name: Travis Parmeter
text: Good pizza never any problems

name: Jess Kelly
text: The pizza was very good.

name: George Buck
text: Great place. I like the buffet.

name: JEFF BROWN
text: Rudest employees from top to bottom. Talk down to you and interrupt you. Sent out burnt pizza, then try to make excuses and say it is normal. Since when is almost black crust normal?

name: Christine Cooper
text: Staff didn't listen and over charged us. We won't be back

name: Tyler McGuire
text: Estimated 45 minute delivery time. Took an hour and 45 minutes. Just go pick it up from farabee.

name: Laura Yetman
text:
When called, the phone number listed on the internet for this Teal Rd. store says it is out of service.
It looks like there was a review from six months ago (see below) that states the …More

name: Bethany Chambers
text: Lots of things to choose from

name: Lindsay Thomas
text: Great

name: Matthew Zombies
text: The delivery guy sent our pizza to the wrong house and they signed off on it we paid credit and when we called them they said it would be 2 hour wait or we could refund but they didn’t refund because they said we were being suspicious, so done with this place

name: Jeff French
text: Double crust stuffed pizza yuck

name: Scruffy_Muff le ConTEArge
text: Didnt get to experience! Your Phone number isnt even correct!!!

name: Corey Weathers
text: Driver over charge credit card 25$ on blank tip line ! Got money back bit still should be fired!!

name: Tyler Mcguire
text: Never get what we asked for, slow delivery too.

name: John Conner
text: good pizza and salad bar

name: Nick Hurliman
text: Great job on the pizzas

name: Dom Franchesca
text: Ordered pasta and breadsticks on a Tuesday at 7:40pm, took an hour to deliver. Food is not even hot.

name: Susie Tolbertrance
text: This is not the best Pizza Hut compared to the rest attitudes are not the best here and they don't seem to know how how to make the best pizzas as compared to the other Pizza Huts

name: Molly aka Minnie Garrett-Shackelford
text: Always on point

text: The food is great but bad service , the teen waiting on us was talking To her friend most of the time and ignoring us , and when we told the manager he didn't care
